channel.title: Webclient Authorization
channel.description:
I need a bit of help getting my webclient fixed. :P
Everytime I run my Webclient, I get this screen where as my cache is not reliable.
Pictures + Explaination: Loading Webclient as I click Run Java, this is what happens after: [img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/9673/warningsecurity.png[/img] However, I bypass this by pressing Yes and I get this screen: [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/8250/errorclickfordetails.png[/img] But fortunately I can also bypass that by click on it, which gives me this screen: [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/8934/securityexception.png[/img]
I can also bypass that screen and play when I press Reload. This is a pain just doing this, is there a way I can fix this for good? I just want those errors to get out of my way.
[b]Any help would be wanted, and appreciated. [/b]

item.title: Webclient Authorization
